EmailTemplate.name: SD_Emailer_AussieTeachersinBucks1
EmailTemplate.subject: Aussie Teachers Available in Buckinghamshire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Fill any last minute gaps with an Australian teacher NOW! Or, start looking ahead to the New Year and lessen the recruitment head ache for the future.
Tap into our growing pool of Aussie teachers who are keen to hear from you now & accept a position in your school. These teachers will be interviewed in person by Mike Jones, Holmer Green School & Jo Garlick, Great Kingshill School in conjunction with Buckinghamshire County Council.
Your school can hire a Sponsored candidate for 3 x years â€“ solving your recruitment & retention staffing issues. Your school will be fully supported in a start to finish visa process.
